item.description: lambda Example (after java 8) public static double calculate(String operator, double x, double y) { return switch (operator) { case "+","add" -> x + y; case "-","sub" -> x - y; case "*","multiply" -> x * y; case "/","divide" -> { if (y == 0) { throw new IllegalArgumentException("Can't divide by 0"); } yield x / y; } default -> throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown operator "+operator); }; } Example public static double calculate(String operator, double x, double y) { switch (operator) { case "+": case "add": return x + y; case "-": case "sub": return x - y; case "*": case "multiply": return x * y; case "/": case "divide": if (y == 0) { throw new IllegalArgumentException("Can't divide by 0"); } return x / y; default: throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown operator " + operator); } }
